languages.text: The Overseer chooses an ally within their line of sight and grants them {uip|2PERBonus|09793f5510a840f1858079051560828e} stacks of the {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}screened{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text:
The Overseer chooses an ally he sees. That ally is {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}Screened{/g}: each time an enemy attacks this ally, the Cyber-Eagle hits that enemy from above, dealing its weapon damage. The Cyber-Eagle will defend the {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}Screened{/g} ally from {uip|2PERBonus|09793f5510a840f1858079051560828e} attacks in total.
This ability is available whether or not the Cyber-Eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Ascended{/g}. However, it will protect the {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}Screened{/g} ally only when it's {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Ascended{/g}.

languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an ally within their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} and grants them {uip|2PERBonus|09793f5510a840f1858079051560828e} stacks of the {g|f:90f1c90ae52342fda66f67d43e988286}bait{/g} effect.
